summary: Relive the days when Warlords with real steel down South ruled the northern expanse. A tough, juggernaut-like armour to keep your Dragonborn warm and safe.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5]==Nord Warlord==﻿
[/size][/b][/center]
[b][size=4][center]== Description ==[/center][/size][/b]
A early Nord-inspired armour, made out of vanilla pieces and some Witcher 2 assets (thanks to LordOfWar). Fully weight-slidered, and for both genders. The cuirass is the same for both genders, as I went for a more manly sort of look. It has some nice warm pants, however image 3 is before they were added. Keep warm in the frozen wastes! If you would like to use this in your mod, please contact me first and get permission.

The set includes a cuirass, gloves, boots, a helmet and a cape. All pieces can be crafted at a forge once steel smithing is unlocked. The stats are around ebony.

There are two esps included, one with just the armour, and one with leveled lists included. USE ONE ESP ONLY.

[b][size=4][center]== Installation ==[/center][/size][/b]
Unzip into data files or install using Mod Organizer.[center][b][size=4]== Changelog ==
[/size] ﻿Version 1.0, release
[/b][b][size=4][/size][/b][/center][b][size=4][center]== Credits ==[/center][/size][/b]
Thank you to Bethesda for a great game.
Thank you to CD projekt, the makers of Witcher, and LordOfWar for importing their work and properly rigging it for Skyrim.
I wish I could play their great games, but my computer isn't good enough : (

[i]
Please endorse![/i]
author: oliver1706
